message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.DC, cs.SI, cs.NI

This paper discusses erasure codes for distributed storage systems, which involves topics such as information theory (cs.IT), distributed systems (cs.DS), data centers (cs.DC), network infrastructure (cs.NI), and possibly security and privacy (cs.SI). Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.IT and cs.DS, followed by cs.DC, cs.NI, and cs.SI.
